thread.title: Kenya: Workers Told Jobs Are Safe
thread.title_full: Kenya: Workers Told Jobs Are Safe

title: Kenya: Workers Told Jobs Are Safe
text:
By George Murage 
The government has reassured thousands of civil servants that their jobs are safe after the biometric survey. 
Devolution Cabinet Secretary Anne Waiguru said no civil servant has been sacked yet as they are finalising the capacity assessment and rationalisation of the public service programme report. 
Waiguru said the programme will be discussed by the two levels of government before it is made public. 
"We are in the final stages of this report. We know the ministries that have fewer staff, those with an adequate workforce and appropriate measures to be taken," she said last Friday in Gilgil town. Kenya
